itinerary.title: Departure from Thane
itinerary.subtitle: Mango Showroom, Thane
itinerary.description: 12:00 AM – Departure from Mango Showroom, Thane (Saturday, 26th July 2025).

itinerary.title: Arrival at Base Village
itinerary.subtitle: Bajarwadi village
itinerary.description: 06:00 AM – Arrive at Bajarwadi village (base of the fort).

itinerary.title: Introduction & Trek Start
itinerary.description: 08:00 AM – Introduction round and start the trek.

itinerary.title: Summit Arrival
itinerary.subtitle: Rohida Fort
itinerary.description: 10:00 AM – Reach the summit of Rohida Fort.

itinerary.title: Fort Exploration & Descent
itinerary.description: 12:00 PM – Complete fort exploration and start descending.

itinerary.title: Lunch & Return Journey
itinerary.description: 03:00 PM – Lunch and begin return journey to Thane.

name: Rohida (Vichitra Gad) Trek
overview: Join Durgasakha for an adventurous trek to Rohida Fort, also known as Vichitra Gad, near Bhor in Pune. A thrilling blend of history, nature, and panoramic Sahyadri views awaits.
highlights: Explore the historical Rohida Fort, experience the thrill of trekking in the monsoon, relish valley views, and enjoy expert-guided fort information and group camaraderie.
things_to_carry: One shoulder bag, raincoat, sturdy trekking shoes, personal medicines, minimum 2-3 liters of water (mandatory), camera (optional, at your own risk), dry snacks (limited), avoid plastic, avoid deodorants/perfumes.
what_is_included: Travel from Thane to Thane by private bus, 1 lunch, 2 tea/snacks, expert guide charges.
what_is_not_included: Anything not mentioned in the inclusions. Camera charges (if any). Personal expenses.
